title: The prayer of kynge Edwarde the syxte, whiche he made the .vi. of Iuly, Anno. M.D, Liii. and vii. of his reygne, thre houres afore his death, to hym self, his eyes beynge closed, and thynkyng none had heard him. The syxtenth yeare of his age ...
author: Edward VI, King of England, 1537-1553.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Powls Churcheyarde by Rycharde Iugge, dwellynge at the North dore of Powles Churche, at the sygne of the Byble,
